events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred at the intersection causing moderate damage to the front bumper and headlight.
Claim was reviewed and classified under Auto Accident as it involved damages from a car collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle this claim and to contact the customer for further information.
The customer received confirmation that the insurance claim has been acknowledged and is currently being processed.
Request sent to the customer for submitting the police report and photos of the damaged vehicle parts.
Customer successfully provided all requested documents including the official police report and detailed photos.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted materials along with witness statements regarding the accident.
Investigation has concluded with confirmation of the vehicle collision circumstances and validation of claim details.
A settlement offer was sent to the customer detailing the reimbursement amount for repairs and associated costs.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process.
Insurance claim was officially approved following customer agreement to the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for approved claim settlement was successfully issued to the customer's bank account as agreed.
The insurance claim has been formally closed after the full payment was processed and customer confirmation received.
All documents and correspondence related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
